BRain Inspired Computing & Communications Lab @ MICS



Welcome and thank you for stopping by the BRICC Lab!

We are one of a kind lab which conducts joint research in the software and hardware domains of brain-inspired computing - aka Neuromorphic Computing, with applications geared towards Communications and more! We develop spiking algorithms and neuromorphic hardware-architectures which harvest the energy efficiency and robustness of Spiking Neural Networks!

Previous Next

We are looking for passionate new PhD students, Postdocs, and Master students to join the team (more info) !
